meanings.definition: The act of treating someone as a celebrity or hero.
meanings.sent1: During the lionizations of the actor, fans cheered and asked for autographs.
meanings.sent2: The lionizations of the singer at the concert made the audience go wild.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the lionizations of the host led to everyone wanting to take pictures with them.
meanings.sent4: The lionizations of the young athlete in the community inspired many kids to pursue sports.
meanings.sent5: The lionizations of the scientist's groundbreaking discovery spread quickly through the scientific community.

meanings.definition: The process of making someone or something seem important or impressive.
meanings.sent1: In the world of marketing, lionizations play a crucial role in promoting products.
meanings.sent2: The lionizations of the historical figure in the documentary highlighted their impact on society.
meanings.sent3: The lionizations of the ordinary pencil as a revolutionary tool amused the students in the art class.
meanings.sent4: Her lionizations of the ancient artifact turned it into a priceless treasure in the eyes of collectors.
meanings.sent5: The lionizations of the small town's local hero made him a legend in the community.
